text: Robert Herman "Bob" Benmosche (May 29, 1944 - February 27, 2015) was the president and chief executive officer of American International Group (NYSE: AIG ). He was appointed President & Chief Executive Officer by the US Department of Treasury and AIG Board of Directors to succeed Edward M. Liddy. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Bob Benmosche
